title: Honor Level Up During Preseason
body:
Hey Guys,

i recently got a chat restriction and leveled my honor up to rank 3 again before preseason but now i wonder can i still honor level up during preseaon? Would be nice to get an answer for this question. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body:
Today, [still Pre-season][Patch V 7.23] got honor level up from 3 to 4. 
After a long period of honors and time.
I guess just level up to honor level 3 is the easy part, probably the honors and experience you need to gain to level 4 and 5 are much much higher.
Wait, so you can level up your honor in the pre-season? I have been grinding so hard and I get so many honor but I can't get it! Any tips?
Your Honor can still go up and down during preseason just like ranked, but it won't reflect rewards as those are locked in for the end of season already.

Hi Aery or Kiko!

~~According to [Broporo](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/JgsxEPsW), honor levels were locked for end-of-season, just like your ranked status.~~

>**~~Broporo~~**: ~~Honor gains are locked for now during end of season, similarly to ranked matches.~~

~~Looks like you'll have to wait a little while before you can begin leveling up your Honor rank again!~~

Edit: Poro'd
